title: Add @since javadoc tags to the Analyzer component classes
description:
Continuing work started in SOLR-11490, add @since javadoc tags to all Analyzer, Tokenizer, Char and Token filter classes that are used in the fieldtype definitions.

As per the previous guidance, earliest version tag applied will be 3.1.

comments.content: It's easy to forgot to add a @version.  Can we make the absence of a version fail a precommit?  Uwe Schindler I recall you work on precommit; would such a check be easy?
comments.author: David Smiley
